CHA2DS2_VASC_FORMULAS: Anual Stroke Risk; Hipocoagulation; CHA²DS²-VASc Score
CHA2DS2_VASC_ANUAL_STROKE_RISK_STUDY: Prevention of stroke in patients with atrial fibrillation: current strategies and future directions. British Medical Journal. Retrieved 30 December 2012.
CHA2DS2_VASC_SCORE_LEGEND: C - Congestive Heart Failure [+1]; H - Hypertension [+1]; A² - Age >= 75 years [+2]; D - Diabetes Mellitus [+1]; S² - Prior Stroke, TIA or Thromboembolism [+2]; V - Vascular Disease [+1]; A - 65-74 years [+1]; Sc - Sex category if female [+1]
CHA2DS2_VASC_CONGESTIVE_HEART_FAILURE_HI: Indicate if the patient suffers from congestive heart failure.
CHA2DS2_VASC_HYPERTENSION_HISTORY_TXT: Indicate if the patient suffers from hypertension.
CHA2DS2_VASC_STROKE_OR_TIA_OR_THROMBOEMB: Indicate if the patient has any Stroke, TIA or Thromboembolism history.
CHA2DS2_VASC_VASCULAR_DISEASE_HISTORY_TX: Indicate if there is any vascular disease history.
CHA2DS2_VASC_DIABETES_MELLITUS_TXT: Indicate if the patient suffers from Diabetes Mellitus
